name: Samurai(The Rise Of Warrior)- 武士の台頭
name_original: Samurai(The Rise Of Warrior)- 武士の台頭
description:
THIS IS A THIRD PERSON COMBAT RPGS GAME(SINGLE PLAYER) ABOUT KYJI (THE NAME OF THE GAME HERO) WHO WANTS TO BE THE GREATEST WARRIOR IN THE WORLD . THROUGH HER JOURNEY SHE OBTAINS WEAPONES AND ABILITYS TO HELP HER FIGHTING HER ENEMIES AND SHE TRAVELS IN 5 COUNTRIES TO SAVE THE WORLD.


.GOOD STORY TO PLAY.
.GOOD GRAPHIC
.FIGHT UNDERWORLD ENEMIES.



FUTURE UPDATES
.WILL INCREASE NUMBER OF LEVELS
.WILL ADD ARENA TO THE GAME
.WILL ADD A MULTIPLAYER.
